com.chupacadabra.evolution

Interface RandomSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaUtilRandomSource

    public interface RandomSource
    A source of randomness.

    This class is basically an abstraction of Random.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean nextBoolean()
      Get the next psuedo-random boolean.
      double nextDouble()
      Get the next pseudo-random double, uniformly distributed in [0, 1).
      default double nextDoubleOpen()
      Get the next pseudo-random double, uniformly distributed in (0, 1).
      double nextGaussian()
      Get the next pseudo-random Gaussian (standard normal, i.e. normal with mean 0 and standard deviation 1).
      int nextInt(int n)
      Get the next psuedo-random integer, uniformly distributed in [0, n).

    • Method Detail

      • nextInt

        int nextInt(int n)
        Get the next psuedo-random integer, uniformly distributed in [0, n).
        Parameters:
        n - The (exclusive) max.
        Returns:
        The next integer.

        default boolean nextBoolean()
        Get the next psuedo-random boolean.
        Returns:
        The next boolean.

        double nextDouble()
        Get the next pseudo-random double, uniformly distributed in [0, 1).

        Get the next pseudo-random double, uniformly distributed in (0, 1).

      • nextGaussian

        double nextGaussian()
        Get the next pseudo-random Gaussian (standard normal, i.e. normal with mean 0 and standard deviation 1).
        Returns:
        The next Gaussian.
